Yassir is the leading super App in the Maghreb region set to changing the way daily services are provided. It currently operates in 45 cities across Algeria, Morocco and Tunisia with recent expansions into France, Canada and Sub-Saharan Africa. It is backed (~$200M in funding) by VCs from Silicon Valley, Europe and other parts of the world. We offer on-demand services such as ride-hailing and last-mile delivery. Building on this infrastructure, we are now introducing financial services to help our users pay, save and borrow digitally. Helping usher the continent into a digital economy era. We’re not just about serving people - we’re about creating a marketplace to bring people what they need while infusing social values.We believe that investing in AI will result in scaling our company to create unique value for each and every one of our customers. We are looking for an experienced Product Manager to lead our Artificial Intelligence Initiatives. You will join the team that leads and owns the Product vision and roadmap for AI at Yassir, and you will drive the transformation towards having our marketplace optimized by AI. The AI team works closely with all domains (ride-hailing, delivery, financial services) and joining our team requires challenging the status quo, finding visionary value creation opportunities, and reinventing customer experiences through innovative and pioneering use of AI. RESPONSIBILITIESProduct Vision: craft a robust strategy to leverage AI at scale in Yassir, work with customers and app domains to understand the marketplace dynamics and identify the AI opportunitiesProduct Lifecycle Management: own the product roadmap and oversee its execution while balancing requirements across products and countries, and maintaining team health. Manage the entire product lifecycle from ideation to launch and ongoing optimization.Data-Driven Decision-Making: Utilize data-driven insights to make informed decisions, track key performance indicators (KPIs), and iterate on product features to optimize performance and achieve business objectives. Be an ambassador for the power of Data and AI and contribute to making it a driver of success for the company and your co-workers. Stakeholder Management and Collaboration: foster strong ties with partner teams (across product, marketing, operations, etc.), communicate progress and results, anticipate roadblocks and align objectives across stakeholders. REQUIREMENTS5+ years experience as a product manager or in a similar senior-level position3+ years of experience solving business problems using ML/AI products Demonstrated proficiency in AI technologies, machine learning concepts, and a strong technical understanding to effectively communicate and collaborate with development teams.Successful track-record managing product across remote teams.Experience in a rapidly growing company in the mobility, on-demand, or delivery space is a plusBSc/MSc in Engineering, Computer Science, Data Science, or relevant fieldBENEFITSGreat compensation and bonuses including stock options.Blue sky opportunity with the team; shape the strategic direction of the companySharp, motivated co-workers in a fun hybrid environmentPaid company holidaysWHY YOU SHOULD JOIN YASSIRJoin one of the fastest-growing tech companies in AfricaHave a lasting impact on our company's cultureMake a real impact on the world by helping us bring affordable financial and on-demand services to millions of AfricansWork on some really hard technical challenges from identity infrastructure for Africans, digital payment networks to complex mapping and routing systems across the continent.We are the first Algerian startup to go through Y Combinator program and we’re backed by top investors including Unpopular Ventures, Rebel Fund and DainTree.VC

About Us
We empower people by upskilling and reskilling them on digital skills through Tech-enabled, affordable quality trainings. We provide trainings for the future of work on the most in-demand digital skills. We go fast and break things: So far, we have trained +50,000 students in 10 countries in Middle East and Africa.  What we're looking for We are looking for a creative and passionate Product Marketing Manager (PMM) to lead our go-to-market strategy and launch for our latest International IT Certification Education product. As a PMM at GOMYCODE, you will build and unlock acquisition channels for our Certifications and self-paced Education Products. Iterate on the product to maximize value for our users. Execute campaigns that clearly communicate the value of our new product to both businesses and consumers. Key Responsibilities:

Develop and execute a comprehensive go-to-market strategy for our new IT certification product, including market analysis, positioning, messaging, and launch planning.
Collaborate with product, sales, and marketing teams to ensure alignment across all channels and to optimize customer acquisition and retention.
Create compelling marketing materials and campaigns that effectively communicate the product’s value proposition to both B2B and B2C segments.
Engage with customers and partners to gather feedback and insights, using this information to iterate and improve our marketing and product strategies.
Conduct competitive analysis to understand market trends, opportunities, and threats, using insights to refine and adjust marketing strategies.
 Skills and Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. A Master’s degree is a plus.
3+ years of product marketing experience, preferably in the edtech or IT certification industry.
Demonstrated success in developing and executing go-to-market strategies and marketing campaigns for new products.
Strong analytical skills and ability to turn insights into actionable growth initiatives.
Strong understanding of go-to-market strategies and digital marketing tactics.
Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to clearly convey complex ideas to various audiences.
Ability to analyze market data and derive actionable insights.
Creative thinker with the ability to develop innovative marketing strategies.

Job Title: Pricing Specialist  Report to: Pricing & Promotions Team Lead  Location: Tunis, Tunisia  Overview of Role:The role of the Pricing Specialist is to compile product and pricing data from a range of competitor websites across multiple countries and identify and report on trends in pricing and promotional activity to the business. In addition, the Pricing Specialist is responsible for ensuring price changes and promotional discounts are loaded accurately and on time. This role requires excellent attention to detail and a good understanding of the product range and relevant product attributes. The Pricing Specialist will work with a variety web-based programs to manage price, cost, product attributes and competitor product matches.    What you will do:  Assemble detailed pricing analysis and product data from competitor websites  Identify and document equivalent competitor products using product attributes    Monitor and report on competitor promotional activity and market trends  Load price changes in line with pricing strategy and margin policy  Provide ad hoc reviews of key metrics including cost, margin, and price index   Execute promotional activities across various channels using web applications  Collaborate with a variety of internal stakeholders including Country Managers, Merchandising, Product Data Management and Pricing Analytics teams  Other duties as assigned    What we need from you: The ideal candidate is a self-starter with a commitment to producing high quality work and excellent   attention to detail. The candidate should be comfortable working with web-based applications as well   as large datasets and display the ability to solve problems creatively. We are looking for a results- driven team player with a strong willingness to learn and excellent communication skills.     Experience:  University degree or technical certificate required  Previous working experience in market research or competitive analysis preferred  Skills and abilities:  Ability to work effectively within a team  Diligence and excellent attention to detail required  Intermediate level Microsoft Excel, Word, Teams, and Outlook  Proactive and clear communicator  Languages:   English intermediate proficiency required  Other languages are a plus:   French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Czech, Slovene, Slovak, Hungarian      About Pens.comPen.com's personalized promotional products are created for and inspired by small businesses. With 56 years of experience and serving 22 countries worldwide, Pens.com offers MORE value, savings and time to customers through expert guidance on a broad range of personalized promotional products, including writing instruments, stationery, drinkware, bags, gifts, and trade show accessories. Pens.com operates via a network of more than 10 facilities across North America, Europe, Africa, and Asia.To learn more, visit: www.PENS.comPens.com is a National Pen and Cimpress brand (Nasdaq: CMPR).#LI-Onsite #LI-NG1

Assistant Director of Rooms page is loaded Assistant Director of RoomslocationsTunis time typeFull time posted onPosted 8 Days Ago job requisition idREQ10296939 About Four Seasons:Four Seasons is powered by our people. We are a collective of individuals who crave to become better, to push ourselves to new heights and to treat each other as we wish to be treated in return. Our team members around the world create amazing experiences for our guests, residents, and partners through a commitment to luxury with genuine heart. We know that the best way to enable our people to deliver these exceptional guest experiences is through a world-class employee experience and company culture. At Four Seasons, we believe in recognizing a familiar face, welcoming a new one and treating everyone we meet the way we would want to be treated ourselves. Whether you work with us, stay with us, live with us or discover with us, we believe our purpose is to create impressions that will stay with you for a lifetime. It comes from our belief that life is richer when we truly connect to the people and the world around us.About the location:Beachfront relaxation on north Africa’s Mediterranean coast. In the heart of Tunisia’s vibrant and exotic capital city, our modern Mediterranean oasis offers a calm, laid-back beachfront escape alongside this bustling business hub. Relax at our Spa and pools, stay connected with state-of-the-art business services, or take a step back in time – more than 3,000 years of ancient civilization are at your fingertips.BASIC PURPOSE: Directs and controls the activities of the Front Desk, Concierge, Housekeeping, , Bell Staff and Driveway Staff. Acts as the senior manager in these departments when department head is unavailable. Assumes the responsibilities of the Director of Rooms in his/her absence. Responds to a wide variety of guest requests by accurately assessing the guest needs and requests and then adding personal recommendations and touches to achieve maximum customer satisfaction while complying with all Four Seasons’ policies.ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:1. Manages the Department Heads in the departments named above. Ensures thorough communications and follow-up on any problems, guest or employee request or special requirements, and hotel initiatives. Interviews, and trains the staff. Conducts Performance Evaluations and disciplines staff when needed. (25%)2. Reviews and monitors schedules of staff in all departments in the Rooms Division. Monitors their activities to assure that standards are being met, staff is being supported and guest needs are being met. Inspects all areas of responsibility in the Rooms Division. (10%)3. Resolves customer complaints from all areas of the hotel, handling all guest interactions with the highest level of hospitality and professionalism, accommodating special requests whenever possible. Will resolve complaints in person, by phone or through written message. (10%).4. Assists customers in all inquiries in connection with hotel services, hours of operations, key hotel personnel, in-house events, directions, etc. Responds to all guest requests in an accurate and timely manner. Interaction with guest will be in person and by phone. (10%)5. Assures that financial goals are being met. Monitors and controls labor expense, and supplies/equipment expenses. Works closely with Reservations, Sales and the Front Office to maximize rate, occupancy and total revenue. Maintains close relationships with retail tenants and concessions to ensureguest service standards are met along with revenue/expense targets. Assists Director of Rooms in preparing Annual Budget. (10%)6. Takes action in all matters related to the safety, security, satisfaction and well being of hotel guests and employees when senior managers are not available. Responds swiftly and effectively in any hotel emergency or safety situation. (5%)7. Complies with Four Seasons’ Category One and Category Two Work Rules and Standards of Conduct as set forth in EmPact. (10%)8. Works harmoniously and professionally with co-workers and supervisors. (10%)9. Acts as the senior manager in the Rooms Division in the absence of the Director. Assists the Director of Rooms in forecasting and budgeting of revenues and expenses for all departments in the Rooms Division. (10%)NON-ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:1. Assists with responsibilities and duties in the absence of or due to heavy volume in any Rooms Division area.2. Le/la charg(e) de projets sera responsable de la planification, de la coordination et de la mise en œuvre de projets au sein de l'entreprise. Le poste implique une grande varit de tches allant de la dfinition des objectifs et des chances, l'laboration des budgets et la supervision des quipes de travail.Fonctions lies au poste :Dfinir les objectifs commerciaux (planification, moyens, plan d'action…), les chances et les livrables des projets en collaboration avec les parties prenantes internes et externes.Dfinir la politique commerciale de l'entreprise Pilotage des quipes commerciales (pilotage de la performance) Conduire des tudes et des reportings de march pour crer des business plans dtaills sur les opportunits de dveloppement commerciales (expansion, dveloppement de l’activit etc.)Suivre le budget, suivre les dpenses et s'assurer de leur respect et dfinir les objectifs financiers des projetsAdapter les offres de l'entreprise en fonction de l'volution du march Coordonner les quipes impliques dans les projets  (marketing, service clients, service vente etc.), tablir des plans de travail et des chanciers, superviser l'avancement des projets et veiller ce que les objectifs soient atteints.Grer les risques associs aux projets et laborer des plans d'attnuation.Communiquer rgulirement avec les parties prenantes internes et externes, en leur fournissant des mises jour sur l'avancement des projets.Participer l'amlioration continue des processus de gestion de projets.ProfilQualits requises : Capacit d’adaptation;Amabilit;Aisance relationnelle ;Matrise de soi;Soucis de la qualit et de la propret;Autonomie;Rigueur et organisation;Faire preuve de dbrouillardise;Souci du dtail;Esprit d'analyse et de synthse;Avoir sens de l’initiative;Dmontrer de l’autonomie et de la polyvalence.Langue de travail : Franais crit oral (niveau avanc.Franais crit oral (Atout).Conditions d’emploi : Exprience professionnelle pertinente en gestion de projets.

About the job Part-time
Vous souhaitez acquérir une précieuse expérience professionnelle tout en poursuivant vos études universitaires ? Ne cherchez plus, vous êtes au bon endroit pour relever un nouveau défi ! Notre programme vous offre l'opportunité d'utiliser votre temps libre de manière efficace afin de vous développer personnellement et professionnellement.Rejoindre les équipes Vneuron en temps partiel présente de nombreux avantages, tels que la formation, l'expérience professionnelle, une rémunération intéressante, et surtout une intégration parfaite dans un environnement professionnel stimulant.﻿
Les offres de postes en temps partiel au sein des équipes Vneuron touchent désormais plusieurs métiers à savoir :
Génie Logiciel : métier 100% technique autour du développement de nos produits au sein des équipes R&D. Ce métier nécessite une excellente maîtrise des principes de la POO, l'algorithmique et les structures de données avec des connaissances des technologies backend et frontend.
Intégration Logiciel : métier 100% technique autour de l'implémentation de nos solutions et l'adaptation de nos produits aux contextes et exigences de nos clients. Ce métier nécessite une bonne maîtrise de l'algorithmique, des bases de données et une capacité à s'approprier des aspects fonctionnels diversifiés.
Consulting / Gestion de projets : métier 50% technique et 50% de contact direct avec les clients pour des aspects fonctionnels avancés. Ce métier nécessite un bon background technique avec de très bonnes qualités relationnelles et de communication écrite et orale ainsi que la capacité de gérer des projets complexes.
Qualité Logiciel - Automation des ﻿tests : Ce métier nécessite beaucoup de rigueur et un esprit orienté utilisateur avec de très bonnes connaissances en finance et une bonne culture en IT. Il faut aussi être doté de bonnes qualités rédactionnelles avec une bonne logique et un bon esprit de synthèse.
IT Support Client : un métier 70% technique et 30% fonctionnel. Ce métier nécessite des compétences techniques bases de données, en administration des systèmes windows et/ou linux et ﻿en réseaux. Il nécessite aussi une bonne capacité d'analyse et de problem solving et un excellent sens de service et de rigueur.
DevOps/SRE : un métier 100% technique autour de l'automatisation de la création des chaînes CI/CD, l'automatisation de l'infrastructure ainsi que la sécurité de l'architecture sur Cloud.
Sales & Marketing : un métier 100% orienté clients et marchés. Ce métier de la vente nécessite, en plus de l'intérêt prononcé aux nouvelles technologies, une bonne qualité d'écoute et de communication orale et écrite avec un esprit de synthèse et une bonne capacité d'argumentation.
Comptabilité et finance : ce métier nécessite beaucoup de rigueur avec une bonne maîtrise des fondamentaux de la comptabilité de la finance des entreprises et un fort intérêt pour les métiers des TIC.
Talent Acquisition : ce métier nécessite une bonne culture en nouvelles technologies et le génie informatique combiné avec un intérêt prononcé pour la psychologie et le développement personnel.
Pensez à visiter notre site web, à postuler via notre portail de recrutement en répondant exhaustivement au formulaire mis à votre disposition et en choisissant le(s) métier(s) qui vous intéresse(nt) le plus sans oublier d'argumenter vos choix et de détailler vos motivations !

About GoMyCode 
Our mission is to teach 21st Century soft and technical skills, to empower our students, and to change their lives for the better. We are building the future of digital learning in Africa and the Middle East by making technology training programs accessible to everyone! 
We believe in excellence in everything that we do, and this starts with our instructors. We have an international team, and we continue to look for talented hands-on people who can join us to achieve our mission. 
GoMyCode is a student-first organization that pushes our students to develop their self-learning and collaboration skills, work on real practical projects, as well as teach them how to build, design, and ship impactful tech products. About the role
Position: Instructor
Availability: Part-Time & Full time 
Locations: Tunisia (Online, Gabes, Nabeul, Sfax, Sousse, Tunis Centre Ville, Tunis Lac 1, Tunis Menzah 5, Mourouj, kairouan, Bardo, El-Mourouj, Boumhel, Ettahrir, Tataouine)
Subjects :  


Master the Essentials: Web Development Essentials, Python Essentials, Social Media Marketing Essentials
Boost your Skills: Front End Developer - React JS Certified, Software Testing - ISTQB Certified, Cybersecurity - Comptia Security + Certified, Data Analytics - Microsoft Power BI Certified, Graphic Design - Adobe Certified, UX & UI Design, Performance Marketing - Meta certified






Become a Tech Professional: Software Developer Bootcamp, Data Scientist Bootcamp


 What you will do

Inspire students to learn today’s in-demand technical and soft skills. 
Coach students to independently find solutions to their problems.
Guide students in their learning path, encouraging them to learn by making.
Organize weekly meetings and follow-ups with students to ensure their progress.
Evaluate assignments and hold simulated job interviews.
Organize and facilitate group workshops. 
Liaise with the training center to guarantee an ideal student experience.
Assist new instructors through the GoMyCode Mentorship Program.
Record video courses to optimize the students' learning experience.
Provide feedback on how we can improve!
 Other tasks could arise according to the position and the needs of the team. Benefits
A competitive / Good salary that increases over time
Performance-based bonuses
Continuing education: take GoMyCode courses for free + international certification 
The opportunity to join an amazing team and change people’s lives! Minimum Requirements 
Master the Essentials/ Become a Tech Professional:

Passion for teaching and students
Sufficient English language skills
Strong technical skills in the subject matters to be taught
A positive attitude and a 'can do' approach
Excellent communication and organizational skills

About the job Sales Development Representative
Vneuron Risk & Compliance is a leader and a key player in Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and in Combatting Terrorist Financing (CTF). We empower 100+ worldwide financial institutions to achieve full AML compliance in 45+ countries in Europe, Africa, USA, and the Middle East. We are present in Tunisia, France, Cameroon, and Qatar.
The estimated amount of money laundered globally in one year is between 2 to 5% of global GDP, equivalent to $800 billion - $2 trillion US dollars. This huge amount of illicit funds is coming from corruption, drug dealing, child labor, organ trade, and so forth.
Our purpose is to fight financial crime through technology in order to ensure global business growth, and international security and to help change the world for the better. About Software suite Reis RCS
Our solution Reis RCS has been ranked in Chartis Research Quadrant 2022 among the best point solutions in Trade-Based Anti-Money Laundering worldwide.
Most recently, we have been awarded the prestigious Best AML Compliance Solution at the Waters Rankings 2023, a prestigious Technology magazine based in the UK, USA, and Hong Kong.
Our solution Reis RCS ensures the automation of AML compliance processes: Real-time transaction filtering, Transaction monitoring using Machine Learning techniques, and KYC. To date, we are applying daily name screening on about 27 million profiles and more than 15,000 users are using our solutions daily. Our Culture & Values
Vneuron puts the development of its team at the heart of its priorities. We provide a pleasant and comfortable work environment. Our organization is collaborative and flat-structured. And, our management is available and present.
Moreover, We have a passionate and committed young team who values respect and sharing spirit. You will be surrounded by highly skilled experts willing to guide you to evolve in all aspects of your career. We aim to spread our innovative technology worldwide, so we can take part in generating a positive impact.
We believe that every person is unique and special. Thus, we provide attentive and active listening to your ideas and propositions as we believe that you will have an essential role in achieving our next milestone.
In order to strengthen our presence worldwide, we are looking for a Sales Development Representative based in Tunisia.
﻿
Proposed Missions
Prospecting, Lead generation, and new customer relationships establishmentMarket and competitive intelligenceIdentifying customer needs Presenting our company and its products to stimulate the interest of prospects for a Proof Of Concept demoExploitation of Vneruon CRM to log and update all activitiesCustomer Proposal ManagementWork closely with the Account Management team to convert detected opportunities into new customers Required profile
A degree in IT or Finance or having a huge interest in those 2 fields. An engineering degree will be appreciated.Excellent analytical and problem-solving skillsExcellent interpersonal and communication skills Dynamic and self-starterExcellent written and verbal English level is a mustGood French level is appreciatedGood level in a third language (Spanish, Turkish, Portuguese)Great interest and desire to evolve in the sales professionSales Process Understanding is an asset Benefits
The opportunity to work in exciting contexts and to help generate a positive impact around the world.Career Growth opportunityHealthcare and wellness Benefits to you and your familyAn evolving and pleasant environment that challenges you to develop new skillsAppropriate conditions to help you focus on what you love doingA winning team that has relied on Respect, Sharing, and Passion for what it doesEqual Employment Opportunities: Gender, religious, culture equity Next Steps
If you have the ambition to stimulate your career with new challenges while capitalizing on your potential and your perpetual thirst for learning, what are you waiting for?
Apply Now and Contribute to our international success!

Yassir is the leading super App in the Maghreb region set to changing the way daily services are provided. It currently operates in 45 cities across Algeria, Morocco and Tunisia with recent expansions into France, Canada and Sub-Saharan Africa. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both software development and security, with a focus on automating security processes and integrating security into the development lifecycle. You will be responsible for implementing and maintaining secure systems, as well as developing and maintaining security tools and processes to ensure the security of our systems and data.About your role as DevOpsDesign and implement scalable, secure, and reliable infrastructure for our services.Collaborate with engineering teams to ensure seamless integration of new features and services.Monitor and troubleshoot production systems, identifying and resolving issues in a timely manner.Automate deployment and scaling processes to minimize downtime.Continuously improve infrastructure and processes to increase efficiency and reduce costs.About your experienceStrong experience with Linux administration and scripting languages such as Bash, Python, and TypeScript.Knowledge of containerization and orchestration technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes.Experience with cloud infrastructure and services (GCP, AWS, Azure).Strong understanding of network protocols and security best practices.Experience with configuration management tools such as Terraform, CDK for Terraform, or Pulumi.Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Why you should join Yassir😎 You will be part of one of the first Algerian startups to go through the Y Combinator program and one of the fastest-growing tech companies in North Africa. We are current in +30 cities (Algeria, Tunisia, Morocco, Senegal, France and Germany)💸 Attractive salary and you even get a stake in the company🚉 Subsidized public transit pass🤙🏽Have a lasting impact on our company's culture🚀 Perfect timing with renowned investors to build something great📈 Extremely steep learning curve with own responsibility and intensive guidance💯 Make a real impact on the world by helping us bring affordable financial and on-demand services to millions of Africans

Yassir is the leading super App in the Maghreb region set to changing the way daily services are provided. It currently operates in 45 cities across Algeria, Morocco and Tunisia with recent expansions into France, Canada and Sub-Saharan Africa. It is backed (~$200M in funding) by VCs from Silicon Valley, Europe and other parts of the world. We offer on-demand services such as ride-hailing and last-mile delivery. Building on this infrastructure, we are now introducing financial services to help our users pay, save and borrow digitally. Helping usher the continent into a digital economy era. We’re not just about serving people - we’re about creating a marketplace to bring people what they need while infusing social values.ABOUT THE ROLEIn this role, you will be part of our engineering team, working with a high quality code base and the latest tools, where you will promote your skills to be an expert in complex frontend development in Android (kotlin) native platforms. Your primary focus will be development of mobile applications and their integration with back-end services. You will be working alongside other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to a highly dynamic environment, where root cause analysis and rapid collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and the creation of quality products are required.TASKSDesign and build mobile applications for Android.Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applicationsCollaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new featuresIdentify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugsHelp maintain code quality, organization, and automatizationParticipate in brainstorming sessions and contribute ideas to our technology, algorithms and products.Work with the engineering and design teams to understand end-user requirements, formulate use cases, and then translate that into a pragmatic and effective technical solutionDive into difficult problems and successfully deliver results on scheduleREQUIREMENTS Must have technical skillsA minimum of 2 years of experience Language: Android, KotlinFamiliarity with cloud message APIs and push notificationWeb architecture: Rest and restful APIs, micro-servicesVersion control: GITNice to have technical skills (Strongly advised)Containers: Docker, kubernetesCaching, Redis serverScaling, Web load balancingExperience in a rapidly growing company in the mobility, on-demand, or fintech space is a plusBSc/MSc in Engineering, Computer Science or relevant fieldBENEFITSGreat compensation and bonuses including stock options.Ground floor opportunity with the team; shape the strategic direction of the companySharp, motivated co-workers in a fun office environment or in remote Paid company holidaysFull social coverageWHY YOU SHOULD JOIN YASSIR Join one of the fastest-growing tech companies in North AfricaHave a lasting impact on our company's culture Make a real impact on the world by helping us bring affordable financial and on-demand services to millions of AfricansWork on some really hard technical challenges from identity infrastructure for Africans, digital payment networks to complex mapping and routing systems across the continent.We are the first Algerian startup to go through Y Combinator program and we’re backed by top investors including Unpopular Ventures, Rebel Fund and DainTree.VC

job_title: Senior Customer Solutions Consultant / Presales Engineer
job_description:
About the job Senior Customer Solutions Consultant / Presales Engineer
The estimated amount of money laundered globally in one year is between 2 to 5% of global GDP, equivalent to $800 billion - $2 trillion US dollars. This huge amount of illicit funds comes from corruption, drug dealing, child labor, organ trade, and so forth.
Using proven top-notch technologies, Vneuron Risk & Compliance creates world-class software helping financial institutions reach full AML (Anti-Money Laundering) Compliance and Combat Terrorist Financing (CTF).
Our purpose is to fight financial crimes through technology in order to ensure global business growth, and international security in order to help change the world for the better.
We are trusted by 100+ financial institutions worldwide from 45+ countries in Europe, Africa, USA, and the Middle East. We have offices in France, Cameroon, Kenya and Qatar. Experts in the field of Compliance, have listed us in Deloitte Regtech Universe and we have been recognized as one of the Top 100 innovative regtech solutions for the year 2022.  About Software suite Reis RCS
Our solution Reis RCS has been ranked in Chartis Research Quadrant 2022 among the best point solutions in Trade-Based Anti-Money Laundering worldwide.
Most recently, we have been awarded the prestigious Best AML Compliance Solution at the Waters Rankings 2023, a prestigious Technology magazine based in the UK, USA, and Hong Kong.
Our solution Reis RCS ensures the automation of AML compliance processes: Real-time transaction filtering, Transaction monitoring using Machine Learning techniques, and KYC. To date, we are applying daily name screening on about 27 million profiles and more than 15,000 users are using our solutions daily. Culture & Values
Vneuron puts the development of its team at the heart of its priorities. We provide a pleasant and comfortable work environment. Our organizational structure is flat and collaborative, and our management is available and present.
We invite you to be part of a passionate and committed young team who values respect and sharing spirit. You will be surrounded by highly skilled technical and functional experts willing to guide you to evolve in all aspects of your career.
We believe that every person is unique and special. Thus, we provide attentive and active listening to your ideas and propositions as we believe that you will have an essential role in achieving our next milestone and shaping the future of Vneurons value proposition. About the job The Customer Solution Consultant supports sales productivity and deal flow by securing the technical win. He collaborates with sales, support, product, and development teams in order to propose the best-suited deals for potential prospects. Missions :
Qualify potential leads and sales opportunities.Investigate and analyze prospects' needs.Elaborate commercial propositions including technical and functional aspects.Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to reach the needed information.Prepare high-quality Proof of Concept (POC) presentations for potential prospects demonstrating how we can satisfy their need and convince them with Vneurons solution.Ensure negotiations and Q/A sessionsDrive market and competitive intelligence Required profile :
IT background Significant experience in Pre-Sales positionExcellent analytical and problem-solving skillsExcellent interpersonal and communication skillsDynamic, self-starter, curious and empatheticGood written and verbal English levelGood written and verbal French levelSharp, clear, and structured communicator Nice to have:
Engineering degreeExperience in IT salesKnowledge in the Risk & Compliance field Benefits
The opportunity to work in exciting contexts and to help generate a positive impact around the world.Career Growth opportunityHealthcare and wellness Benefits to you and your familyAn evolving and pleasant environment that challenges you to develop new skillsAppropriate conditions to help you focus on what you love doingA winning team that has relied on Respect, Sharing and Passion for what it doesEqual Employment Opportunities no matter your gender, religion, culture, etc. Next steps If you have the ambition to stimulate your career with new challenges while capitalizing on your potential and your perpetual thirst for learning, this job is for you. Apply Now and become the next Spark! Follow us on LinkedIn to learn more about the Spark team and our Spark solutions.
We would be thrilled to meet you and give you much more information!

About the job Product Business Analyst
Vneuron Risk & Compliance est un leader et un acteur clé dans la lutte contre le blanchiment d'argent et le financement du terrorisme. Nous créons des solutions logicielles en utilisant des technologies de pointe et robustes. D'après les statistiques de l'UNODC (United Nation Office on Drugs and Crime), l'argent blanchi à travers le monde représente 2-5% de notre PIB international, équivalent à $800 milliards - $2 trillion US dollars. Cette somme colossale de fonds illicites provient de la corruption, du trafic de drogue, de l'exploitation des enfants au travail, du commerce d'organes et ainsi de suite.
Notre principale mission est de créer de la technologie pour la lutte contre les crimes financiers afin de participer à la croissance mondiale et à la sécurité internationale.
Utilisée par plus de 15 000 utilisateurs, notre solution Reis RCS assure l'automatisation des processus de conformité AML (Anti-Money Laundering). Reis RCS fait partie du top 100 des solutions regtech les plus innovantes pour l'année 2022.
Nos clients sont des institutions financières venant de plus que 45 pays européens, africains, du moyen orient et de l'Amérique. Nous sommes basés à Tunis et nous avons des filiales en France, au Cameroun et au Qatar.
Vneuron met au cœur de ses priorités l'épanouissement de ses collaborateurs et permet à ses équipes de travailler dans des conditions optimales. Notre équipe est animée par le goût du challenge et elle porte les valeurs du respect, de l'engagement et de l'évolution. Vous serez aussi entourés par des experts techniques et fonctionnels pour vous aider à évoluer dans votre parcours professionnel. 
Afin de renforcer notre équipe produit et parce que notre force réside dans la compréhension des besoins et des métiers de nos clients, nous sommes à la recherche d'un Business Analyst confirmé.  Missions :
Maîtrise de la problématique métier et collect du besoin du client.Compréhension et analyse du besoin client et du roadmap de nos produits pour la rédaction des spécifications technico-fonctionnelles.Veille sur l'évolution du besoin du marché ainsi que sur l'apport de la concurrence.
Planification et animation des ateliers de cadrage de besoins.
Présentation et validation des spécifications détaillées avec l'équipe produit puis avec les équipes développement et qualité logicielle.Création de maquettes statiques pour renforcer votre output
Coordination et suivi du développement du cahier de charge avec l'équipe développement. Profil Recherché :
Ayant un diplôme d'ingénieur avec un bon background informatiqueUne première expérience significative dans un poste similaireVous disposez dune bonne qualité rédactionnelle avec de bonnes capacités de communication écrite et verbale en français et en anglaisUn bon esprit danalyse, de synthèse et de résolution de problèmesVous aimez travailler sur des sujets complexes et vous faites preuve d'autonomieVous avez le sens du service et vous êtes orienté utilisateurDes connaissances en Risque & Conformité AML seront un atout Avantages :
L'opportunité de travailler sur des sujets et des problématiques intéressantes dans un contexte évolutifL'adoption dune mission et dune vision de changer le monde vers le mieux Une équipe jeune, passionnée, à grand potentiel et qui valorise le plus l'esprit de partageUn environnement agréable et convivialUne évaluation équitable de votre candidature quel que soient le genre, la nationalité, la religion, l'origine et la couleur du candidat. Vous avez de l'audace et l'envie de réussir, n'attendez plus, venez contribuer à notre succès ! 
Suivez-nous sur LinkedIn afin de mieux connaître notre Spark team et nos solutions.

About the job Opérateur(trice) de Saisie
Opérateur(trice) de Saisie Éditeur de logiciel Tunisien spécialisé dans la conformité réglementaire. Vneuron est aujourd'hui un acteur incontournable dans le métier de la confirmité anti-blanchiment d'argent opérant dans plus que 45 pays dans le monde entier. Créée depuis 2007, Vneuron a toujours misé sur la création de la propriété intellectuelle et de progiciels pour le secteur financier.
Envie de bâtir un futur prometteur et prospère ? Nhésitez plus ! Postulez dès maintenant ! Personne n'est meilleur que vous pour intégrer notre équipe.
Votre Challenge au sein de l'équipe sera comme suit :
Lecture et interprétation de documentsSaisie des informations récoltéesVérification de la correspondance des informations de notre base de connaissances avec les documents mis à votre disposition Ce que nous vous offrons :
Formation sur les outils et les méthodes de travailPossibilités dévolution en fonction de votre potentiel et vos ambitionsCadre de travail international agréableRémunération motivante en fonction de vos performances Compétences requises :
Un diplôme universitaireUn bon niveau en Français est fortement appréciableOrganisation, rigueur et productivitéL'expérienced'utilisationd'un navigateur Internet (Internet Explorer ou Firefox) et des outils bureautiques est nécessaire
